content:
In the case that only one value is given to the Range Datatype (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/datatypes.html#Range) should the display be undefined or show a range with the given value?

For example if low is undefined but high is 4, should the range be displayed as 'undefined - 4' or just 'undefined'?
well, depends on quite why you are displaying it, but I would expect that you should display the high as pertinent information
